Alemayehu Fentaw Weldemariam (amuru 8 June 1980) bu onye okachamara iwu iwu obodo Etiopia, onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi, onye nyocha esemokwu, na onye nwere ọgụgụ isi ọha.

A mụrụ Alemayehu Fentahun na Alamata, Tigray Province, Ethiopia na 8 June 1980.
Alemayehu Weldemariam na-akụzi Iwu Iwu na Mekelle University School of Law ebe ọ bụkwa onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke Law Review

O nwere Master of Science in Conflict Analysis & Resolution (2016) site na Mahadum George Mason dị na Arlington, Virginia na Master of Arts (summa cum laude) na Peace & Conflict Studies (2009) site na European University Center for Peace Studies na Stadtschlaining, Austria, ebe ọ bụkwa onye otu Salzburg Global Seminar. E wezụga nke ahụ, ọ bụ onye otu Academy for International Business Officials, na Beijing, China
Ọzọkwa, ọ natara LL.B degree site na Addis Ababa University School of Law na July 2005.
